title: Why I’m Number One
detail_text: <:th_ch0009/>Promise me that you’ll never ever, eeever, tell anyone, okay.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. I got it, Nico-san. But I was a little surprised.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>By what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That you came to ask me to accompany your singing practice with the piano because you don’t want to lose to Maki-chan’s singing. You always seem so proud and dignified, Nico-san, so I never expected you would ask me for something like this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Look, in order to make it look like that, you have to put in the effort to back it up! Of course, I will never show it to my fans! If you want to be the number one idol in the universe, this much is only natural!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>W-, what. Say something. I didn’t say anything weird, did I!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I-, I’m sorry! Umm, it surprised me, but in a different way.... You really are amazing, Nico-san. I’ll have to play along with all my might.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess you were affected by this Nico Nii’s overflowing charisma, huh~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. I’ll try my best to accompany you and not lose to you, Nico-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
